Functions
fza_fnc_weaponRocketInventory
Description

Gathers rocket inventory information, using given turret to work out whether it is selected or not.

Parameters
_heli

The helicopter that fired it

Returns
Array

[_rkt1, _rkt2, _rkt3, _rkt4, _rkt5]

where _rktN is either [] or [_name, _qty, _pylons, _shortCode] _name - the name of the pylons

Examples
Author

mattysmith22
